description: A beautiful, private apt at Bushwick with new furniture. Very cozy and comfy.All for regular life. There are cable TV, wifi. Kind neighbors The apartment is a shot walk to supermarket,groceries and  bars,cafes, pizza place. Near subway line (L train) one block away  and 15 min to Manhattan.
name: Absolutely New 2-BR apt in Bushwick
review: We really enjoyed our time in Alenas apartment and can recommend it! Great Subway connection to Manhattan!
